comments: I love this game! If you like chess and like to think you'll like this game no doubt! There are some ads but not so much that it makes me want to turn off my Wi-Fi. It has cute graphics and runs smooth. I just cant get enough. As far as scary no not scary a little like whoa they're gunna hit.. Oh wait phew how did they not hit? RGB keep up the good work with this game and all your other free stuff! You guys make great games for all ages!

I love this puzzle game to death. I can literally play it all day and never get tired. Thank you for the challenging ones, it gets my brain going and it makes the game more tense. I certainly am inlove with the music. Please put a soundtrack on youtube, I would love to listen to it !! Thank you creators of the game, I enjoy playing it so much, and I do hope that there's more.

I like it! Certain levels were so challenging to beat in Expert Mode I thought it was impossible. But with some patience you can solve it! (With the exception of Houston U-4 how do you beat that in 46 moves lol)
I don,t have the words to say about the game but only one problem of this game ads always on. The top of the screen

This game has alot of benefits, especially, the decision making, plan ahead, multi tasking, pattern recognition and many more. Thank to this game, its very addictive, plain and simple, make you relax and it doesnt stress. Deserve to be 5 star.
Cool I like the complexity of it, it isn't always too easy. But I would like a 'reset' option so I don't have to drag the arrows back every time I go wrong

descriptionHTML:
RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive!

You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.


This is how you do it:

🤔 Draw routes for your truck drivers
🎁 Make sure that every house receives the correct package
▶️ Press play
🚚💨 Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!


Features:

✓ 400 FREE levels
✓ Easy gameplay suitable for all ages
✓ Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans
✓ Beautiful graphics
✓ Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effects

The game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!


★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★
★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★


Available In-App purchases:

PREMIUM 💎 KING TRUCK 👑
★ The premium version of RGB Express
★ Removes ads
★ Supports game development and future updates

HINTS 🤯
★ The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.


Please note:
★ Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video
★ TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).

comments: My game is literally unplayable right now. For about a week now, it has randomly just lagged out and would take 5 seconds for every action to actually take place. Now, when i boot up the game, it just freezes when i click on anything. My shop tries to open but just goes to a black screen and freezes. I will try to play for a few more days, but if i cant play by the end of the weekend, i will be deleting the game.

What is wrong with the newest update? I can't acquire my item from the switch shop. Every time I click on get item, the black screen goes to the top left of the screen. And I can see the normal background picture. When that happens I have to close the game and reset. I've tried to get the item 20 times and it does that every time.

Was a great game til the update. Now I have to open it twice for my energy to update and for the money in the pawn shop to change. Also when I bargain with clients now it's alway a negative profit compared to before. More annoying then anything

It's a fun game my only complaints are that you have to wait until your energy refills. There is no way to earn energy and you should make it so you can customize and/or upgrade your shop. Make it more exciting. Also you open the building that say they will finish construction soon because the game gets boring if there no excitement added to it.

I enjoy playing this game. Currently I have two major problems with it.  1. I wish I could change orientation based on how my phone is tilted.  2. I tried to have Mutt trade something really expensive and now it freezes every time I attempt to open the trade.

Cool. Fun. But your guys really need to fix the bugs. I would load it and keep it open doing certain things (playing a auction getting a item appraised and it would FREEZE or take absolutely forever. I would have to close the game out and re load it.

descriptionHTML:
Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!

HIGHLIGHTS

💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!

💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!

💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!

💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!

💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!

💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!

Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!

Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!

Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

Otherwise great game.

All in all very entertaining

comments: The game has gorgeous graphics. Each scene is very detailed and fun to play. Some are a little difficult to get through if you like to keep your brightness low like me and some items are incredibly tiny to find. But it has a fun premise and it's a pretty good time waster. However, you can't play for long. Each play takes 20 energy and it goes by quickly. Waiting for it to refill takes a long time. Getting stars to solve cases also takes some time. It's basically the wait time in this game that kinda kills it.

This is a really enjoyable game, especially for fans of HP and/or the fantasy genre. The graphics are beautiful and the characters look so real. I just wish energy wasn't used up so quickly. At 20 points of energy a pop you can't really play for long, and the XP needed to level up is also high so you usually have to wait for the energy to refill. Also, when you level up you don't get a complete energy refill; you only get about half. Waiting time to complete tasks is also too high IMO. At least a couple of hours if not longer. With any other game this is usually enough to turn me off but the gameplay, the story and the graphics are so good that I'm willing to exercise a lot of patience.

Beautiful hidden object experience. Offers a variety of gameplay including mirrored levels, timed levels, and spot the differences. The Facebook connection is there without being thrown in your face like some other games and is a nice subtle addition. It does work off of energy however I am willing to stick it out just for the storyline.

It's a good game but having to wait so long for the energy build up takes away the excitement of the game play. Iv noticed alot of other game users have the same outlook on this game. Even the timers for tasks take way to long.. 6 hours to complete? Really? Why so long? People will get bored and find another stimulating game. This is based on the whole wizarding world so it should be alot more magical and less time consuming.

Love the game overall but it takes way too long to build up energy. Because of this you are only able to play for very short periods of time before you have to wait for the energy to build back up. Also some of the 'inspection' actions take way too long. Waiting 6+ hours for an action to be completed is excessive. I would love to be able to play the game for more than just a couple of minutes a day. I realize it is done to encourage people to make in app purchases, however, perhaps you could provide a paid version of the app to avoid this. I love the game and would love to be able to play it more.

Love this game, but it has only 14 cases!! WTH?? The last case acted like you were going on to another one, but no. Feel like it shouldn't have been released with only 14 cases. Very similar to Criminal Case in a lot of ways. The upgrades help a lot, but it takes a while before you notice their effect and cost is too high, IMO.

descriptionHTML:
Cash is the name of the game in Cash, Inc. the ultimate cash clicker game! Tap your way to fame and fortune and you’ll become the most popular billionaire in this business adventure!

This tapping game was made for you, boss. Make money by tapping your way to the upper echelon. Tap to build one business, two businesses, three, and so much more! After all, a business tycoon has to start somewhere.

Click and tap all day and then let rich superstars take your biz to the next level! Become a money-crazed business tycoon as you see your riches grow.

The rich life lets you accumulate millions and billions of dollars while your workers do all the work for you. The adventure to fame starts now!

Cash, Inc. Features:

IDLE CLICKER THAT MAKES YOU RICH
• Tap, tap, tap and get rich while barely lifting a finger!
• Click and then rest. Profit from your businesses without actually being there!
• Tapping will make you a fortune. Use your earnings to invest in various businesses and then sell them to win the public’s sympathy!
• Make money and pile up profit so you can spend your money on what YOU want.

BUSINESS TYCOON AMENITIES:
• Click and tap upgrade your businesses and keep the money flowing!
• Make money while you renovate your business tower. More money means having better and more stunning tower appearances!
• The idle tycoon lifestyle means you get to manage profitable businesses while hanging out with superstars.
• Billionaire’s paradise: Lead a lazy, yet productive life while everyone takes care of you and your businesses!
• Hire celebrities and make more money while enjoying your fame!

SHARE YOUR WEALTH
• Make it rain money and brag about your riches on social media!
• Be a money machine and compare what you own against other business tycoons around the world.

Tap to keep your cash flow healthy and thriving as you continue building your business, fortune and reputation. Get famous and become the most successful business tycoon in this idle clicker game. Watch as the rich and famous fight for your favor in Cash, Inc.!

Download now to start your own business adventure to fame and fortune!

Disclaimer: Playing Cash, Inc. requires a secure internet connection.

comments: Love the detail of going down to nut and bolts practically to do repairs. Two bones of contention:  The timer to access new barns is too long, does not make for satisfying game play. Also, after purchasing a tool upgrade, I was pleased to see a longer list of repairs gained. Great. Except I couldn't remove the fuel pump to remove the fuel tank. It said my tools needed upgrading for that one part. Please fix that bug so all repairs needed can be made with tool set level.

It's a good game with room for improvement, I've leveled up my tools to level 4 but it's so annoying when it says tools need to be upgraded, this need to be  improved. All so when you fix a vehicle the money could be upped a bit more. I know you can re-paint the vehicle but I wish you could improve the wheels and the interior of the vehicle to make some more money. The other thing that the other paint uses coins how about instead or all so to pay for the other paint with the in game money.

Well let's see ..played the game fixed 7 cars and I made about $70,000 on the game I bought another car and had to replace just about all the parts on it I bought all the parts and was in the process of putting all the parts on it and in the middle of that ,the game shut down on me I opened it back up to continue playing and it had started back over from the beginning at the tutorial and I lost all progress. y'all need to fix this. until this is fixed and or I am put back where I was on the game then I would not recommend downloading this game or any of the other mechanic games for 2018, much less even playing it. it's a waste of time and data also had a trouble with the other 2018 version mechanic game you will see a posting on that one where it's not giving enough time to fix panels and it's not registering clicking on panels to find out if anything's messed up on them .thanks for the problems and the issues. This game is on this phone of mine and the other game is on my other phone developers. You'll see a post on the other garage mechanic 2018 game by Wesley wright. Yaw need to fix these issues ok , because these bad ratings I have been seeing by others isn't looking good for you games.

Game is great but I would've loved some more features or more cars it gets repetitive real fast please add more features like OBD SCAN or inside car customizations also pc version you can change rims and wheels lights bumpers and add more cars not saying you should add all that but maybe some if possible to make it less repetitive
"Breaks" is misspelled, and the photo button is in German or something. Cool game, can really help someone learn how a car works.
Hi, I think this game is great, but it has a problem. Whenever I try to scroll on the menus all the items in the menu dissappear.  Would you please see what you can do to fix this?

comments: Everything was great except in the beginning it kept saying I didn't find any mice but I found them twice on the first one.. but then I restarted it and it worked fine.. until it kept freezing and I had to restart my tablet.. after doing that like 5 times it worked great thru out the whole game.. I kinda felt like it was a lot shorter then the other games. But other then that I had fun playing it and I'm super excited for other to come out so hurryyy!!!!!!! Lol

This is just like the other game you guys made, the one with the doctor in the hospital, down to the exact same thing of "play the first couple of levels for free but if you like you pay" I bet this one is for the same price. On a side note, the story is different but the game play is the same, go have a look if you want. I will say this is a good game and I take nothing away from the hard work you have done. Good looking graphics, good smooth game play. A game you can get into and do try the other games of this developers you may like it as well. Over all a good game I just do not think it is worth $15. But best of luck guys.

I absolutely love this game. However I had to order a new phone due to mine being replaced for insurance purposes and I was logged into my Facebook and lost all my progress and the app is NOW wanting me to repay. I don't wanna have to pay another 9.99. If there's anyway I can get my game back.

I've bought nearly most of these games and this one has disappointed me most. When I finish a level it won't actually finish so I have to keep restarting it. Also some of the bonus levels are hard to understand what I'm supposed to do. I don't know if it's a bug but it's kinda annoying. Apart from the bug, just like the Delicious games etc it's great. Just need to fix the bugs :)
I would rate higher but it's says I haven't found any mice.  But I always find them twice each level and it says mouse found when I click on it.  It's frustrating.

This refuses to let me log into Facebook and everytime I try to click on the camera to give to one of the agents it freezes and the character won't even walk over to the camera I love GameHouse games but this one is glitching so bad please fix it

descriptionHTML:
Help rookie detective Parker solve cases and bring criminals to justice!

In Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice, a streak of murders plagues the city. Become a homicide detective and restore law and order in this unique crime investigation game!

Lily Parker is a smart and righteous detective who works hard to put criminals behind bars and make the world a better place, even if her own life is a mess. Victor Lane is a smug but charming criminal defense attorney who doesn’t care who he’s defending as long as he’s getting paid. He’s also the best at his job.

When some of the criminals Lane defended in the past start dying, Parker’s forced to work with him to find the culprit. Could it be one of the criminal’s victims? Or perhaps some kind of vigilante? Is Lane himself being targeted?

Immerse yourself in the first episode of an exciting time management story game, feel the thrill of the chase and prove that your detective skills are second to none! Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice is waiting for you.

🕵️‍♀️ Help expose the hidden killer before another victim falls!
🔎 Look for evidence while investigating 9 different locations
🕵️‍♀️ Master 18 mini games based on forensic investigation
🔎 Examine clues and analyze objects using forensic techniques
🕵️‍♀️ Play through 60 extraordinary story levels and 30 extra challenge levels
🔎 Complete your case file by collecting diamonds
🕵️‍♀️ Conquer daily challenges to earn extra diamonds for your case file
🔎 Beat your high score with a choice of 15 awesome endless levels

Try the first few levels for free! To access the full game, you can either unlock everything with an in-app purchase, or continue playing the free version with ads.

Follow Parker & Lane on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Heart's Medicine and Fabulous: https://goo.gl/SXb8sa

comments: As others have said, the longer you play, the worse it performs and the more space it takes up, and after a while ads start causing the game to crash. However I've managed to get around it by reinstalling every couple of weeks. Other than that it's a good little game.

It's a pretty fun game, better than I thought it would be. There is one problem, you don't really need to buy "Flooz", but if you do. The prices are a little outrageous. Like 5$ for 100 Flooz, seems a little money hungry. And 100 Flooz for 15 days is 29$ is outrageous as well. I've played other games with better things to do besides upgrading and usually 100 "diamonds" of anything would last 30 and would cost 10-15$. Seems like you're trying to rip people off. Besides the money hungry creators, good game to kill time.

It has bugs. Like how sometimes skills don't activate right away, and on rare occasions, not at all. The currencies are pretty fair; I don't feel like have to buy anything (sucks for the devs, but it's not like I can buy anything even if I wanted to). Events keep the game fresh, and I always feel like I have something to do at all times, so it does a good job of keeping me occupied for 20-30 minutes at a time.

The first idle game that caught my attention. At first, i thought that it's just "one of those idle games".. But, the more I play the more i get hooked because of unique game mechanics. I might give this 5 stars in the future.

I think the game would be enjoyable if it did not crash ALL the time. Get to a new level? Crash. Watch a video? Crash. Crash Them All might be a more fitting name for the only game that has ever crashed more than once on this phone.

Incredible game play it for hours and love it soooo much only good things to say other than server connecting but it's no big deal love the game the style the graphics the game play is all awsome I do have some ideas for the game if your interested number one being adding carnivore and herbivore types into the game so you could have dinosaurs and number 2 is world bosses were the entire community can all defeat one boss and 3 to have the ability to friend people not through Facebook. Love the game it's so good thanks for putting so much hard work into it and adding awsome features cheers

comments: Pretty good for finding it on Facebook. I'm liking it so far, but there's no tutorial or anything like it, so you're on your own figuring things out. Some item descriptions aren't in English, and the text after you gain things in combat for gold and souls goes too fast. Still don't know what it's saying.   Would recommend though just for a quick thing to do when you're bored and have time to kill.

A hidden gem. Premium currency is handed out in enough amounts to buy important things. Easy enough to figure out but a lack of a tutorial could turn away some. Only reason I took a star away because musketeer class line has high dex and str scaling skills..??

A surprising find, i really don't expected this game to have this level of quality. This game successfully give me the feeling of discovery and exploration while in expeditions, and i feel compelled to build and better the manor. But a disappointment is how there are no differences between characters other than their classes and aesthetics.

This game is great takes a little wile to figure out but it is no way a pay to play you have the option to buy gems that help u acheive things faster. Its not much of a grind either to acheive things that are less common with that said the classes are somewhat confusing finding the correct skill set and play style can be hard

What a surprising good game, somehow it manages to keep me up logging at it daily to train my heroes and do some quest, a thing that would be really amazing would be cloud support, so you can play the same savefile on two devices, didnt found any game breaking bugs and so far the game didnt pushed the shop into me which was nice. All in all a 4.5 out of 5. Can t wait to see this game evolve and age.

3 out of 4 members of the team died and the last one cannot carry the weight and I'm stuck because I have maximum load and I cannot leave the fight drop cannot collect cannot leave. I can't do anything. A big problem that should have been anticipated.. fixed
description: Official sequel of classic popular adventure game Dungeon Survivor.Dungeon Survivor II ‚Äì Dark Tide is a simulation and dungeon adventure game.This time, you will lead your daring mission to the no-man‚Äôs land, have an unexpected fantasy adventure in the ancient and mysterious continent.Story of the World- Be the Ruler of the Sanctuary, the eschatological Manor, guide your people and warriors to fight against the fallen Country.- Upon the journey, you‚Äôll encounter different people.Will you draw out the sword or reach out your hand?  That is for you to decide.- Little, helpless and pathetic humans gather together to battle against the Black Tide. Every decision you make is of vital importance.Class & Adventure- 6 main Classes with more than 50 sub-classes, each with unique personality.- Easy but flexible team formation, Mixed? All Melee? All Mages, whatever you like. Your Imagination is the only limit.- Diverting strategy setting, play a sure card and win the battle!- Vicious creatures, quirky traps, weird strangers-the world is always full of accidents and surprises.- Find the powerful Monster and beat them up!Battle & Speed- Real-time PVP with hand control. let‚Äôs duke it out in the Arena!- Heading to the leaderboard for the CROWNÔºÅ- Marching on the Lost Castle and unlock the Arena!Classic placing and gain mode- No pains but gains Place and gain resources every time you enter the game.- Wit and adroit like you, even with limited resources, can definitely build up a prosperous Manor.======Contact Us======Follow our Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/dungeonsurvivor2Join Discussion: https://www.facebook.com/dungeonsurvivor2/groups
descriptionHTML:
Official sequel of classic popular adventure game Dungeon Survivor.

Dungeon Survivor II – Dark Tide is a simulation and dungeon adventure game.

This time, you will lead your daring mission to the no-man’s land, have an unexpected fantasy adventure in the ancient and mysterious continent.


Story of the World
- Be the Ruler of the Sanctuary, the eschatological Manor, guide your people and warriors to fight against the fallen Country.
- Upon the journey, you’ll encounter different people.
Will you draw out the sword or reach out your hand? That is for you to decide.
- Little, helpless and pathetic humans gather together to battle against the Black Tide.
Every decision you make is of vital importance.

Class & Adventure
- 6 main Classes with more than 50 sub-classes, each with unique personality.
- Easy but flexible team formation, Mixed? All Melee? All Mages, whatever you like.
Your Imagination is the only limit.
- Diverting strategy setting, play a sure card and win the battle!
- Vicious creatures, quirky traps, weird strangers-the world is always full of accidents and surprises.
- Find the powerful Monster and beat them up!

Battle & Speed
- Real-time PVP with hand control. let’s duke it out in the Arena!
- Heading to the leaderboard for the CROWN！
- Marching on the Lost Castle and unlock the Arena!

Classic placing and gain mode
- No pains but gains
Place and gain resources every time you enter the game.
- Wit and adroit like you, even with limited resources, can definitely build up a prosperous Manor.

comments: The usual city builder game that's easy to build up your castle/city way faster than it's other counterparts. The people I've met on this game were pretty kind, the battle simulating is a nice touch which I haven't seen anywhere else. Sad that I only get to see like 3/4 models of the same monsters though.

In short a dishonest scam. Videos show diablo like combat and the construction of a farm like area where you could customize layout and place walls where you wanted and... none of that has anything to do with this clone of 100 other games. You cant even access in game chat for days. -5* for false advratisment

After playing mobile strike for a solid year, that game is really expensive if you want to be at the top with the big dogs. And this game seems great to where you don't have to spend much and actually enjoy the game. The graphics on her are amazing. I would suggest playing this game to all. üëçüëä

Been playing game for couple of days, enjoying it so far. Lots to do, build times not to long at start, graphics good. Love the fact that in game purchases are there if you want them but you are not pushed to buy. Game plays well on my Samsung tablet and LG phone. Been playing for months now, still love it, definately not a play to win if you get into a good alliance

This is a war game where no one wants ts to fight. Don't try attacking anyone bigger than you. They won't fight you back, they will just attack your buildings, which you won't be able to defend. It costs real money to avoid having them destroyed. Spend your time and money somewhere else.

When I first downloaded it promised you didn't need to pay to win and that hackers would be felt with - that was a lie. If your not prepared to spend a lot of money your just going to get wiped out by those who do or their hacker friends. This game isn't worth the time and data needed to play until there is a level and fair playing field.

descriptionHTML:
Google Play’s Carnaval - Festive updates you can’t resist

Build your own world in this strategy war game! War and Order is the perfect fusion of real time strategy, tower defense, and castle building games and has received several Global Google Recommendations.

Orcs, elves, and mages are yours to command in a gorgeous 3D medieval game world. Raise a massive fantasy army for HUGE fully animated battles. Clash with enemies from all over the world in real-time! Choose your alliance and take castles, slay monsters, and stake new territory as a tribe! This is WAR, and there’s never a dull moment as your screen lights up with constant new battles, chats, and upgrades!

You must battle to become more powerful than any king in history in this dangerous war game. It’s up to you, your strategy, and your allies to conquer an endless world of empires and imagination.

★HOMELAND
• Recruit and train over 50 fantasy soldiers, uniting Orcs, Elves, Humans, Mages, Beasts, and Angels.
• Your ultimate building game: Construct and upgrade tons of buildings for new soldiers, buffs, and resources!
• Research new magic and technology FAST for cutting-edge tactics and weapons!

★ALLIANCE
• Friend, feud, and chat with players from around the world in real time.
• Fight and build together to conquer enemies and build castles you could never hold alone.
• Share and expand territory for exclusive bonuses!
• But remember! This is a war strategy game. Tust no one!

★CONFRONTATION
• Sweep the battlefield in huge real-time PvP matches!
• Build your force to leviathan proportions!
• Engulf other lords’ castles as you expand your territory.

★CONQUEST
• Command and conquer other players’ castles to plunder their resources and climb power rankings!
• Vanquish roaming monsters for their treasures, from man-eating Ogres to massive Dragons.
• Play castle defense games and protect yourself and your allies from would-be conquerors.

★EMPIRE
• Not just a one castle game: Take over the Royal City to rule over the realm with unheard of power and privileges!
• Explore unknown lands to find elite resources, ancient ruins, and more surprises!
• Grow your alliance territory for richer rewards and resources!

Follow War and Order on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/WarandOrder1/
developerAddress: 1201 Orange street, suite 600, Wilmington DE, USA
recentChanges: Google Play‚Äôs Carnaval - Festive updates you can‚Äôt resist
1. Accounts can now be bound to multiple 3rd party services! A single game account can now bind 2 third-party login methods.
3. Optimized Elite Wars declaration requirements: Cannot declare on alliances that will battle within 2 hours.
summary: Build a fantasy empire! Orcs, elves, amazing graphics. Battle players worldwide!
title: War and Order

comments: Very annoying problem with Google Play account disconnections at task swap. Fix this, and I will be able to actually play the game. Since I use my phone for making real income, I need to swap screens to other activities, and each time do a four step log in process back into the game. I have never seen this problem before in any other game, no reason this game would be different. About the game? Well, I'll tell when this problem is gone üòÖ

It is  great game, for ages 10 and up even 9 is okay. It is cool that we are building a town from scratch, like from the prehistoric time, and building our way up. Not like other game that start you off with big present day buildings. It doesn't cost a lot to do things like building and removing things, some object are free, they give the right amount of money and you can always win some more diamonds. In other games you would have to pay to remove object and buildings are ridiculously expensive.  It is hard to make money in other games and to make diamonds. I personally at night put my hunters too make things that take 8 hours and in the day things that take 5 to 15 minutes but sometimes 1hour. It is a very good game, it is almost as a real life city town, empire.

Boring!! Hurry up and wait. Never enough coins and forge points. Constantly waiting for buildings to make money and points. Ready made buildings. Can't build your own. Waiting, waiting, waiting. Been playing about 2 hours and already bored to death!

Although FoE is very enjoyable, it can get very complicated, especially for new players. The biggest drawback is the lack of instructions...new players, unless taken under the wing of an experienced player, have to fumble through at first, many times guessing or using trial and error to accomplish the simplest things.

At first I was a little unhappy with the amount of stuff I can do with spending diamonds, but I now find it refreshing, not to spend active hours on a game in order to receive a reward. I'm glad they reward patience.

Started playing, made some progress, then the next time I went to play it wouldn't link back to my Google account and kept saying incorrect password. You get one star because that was frustrating and I couldn't get back to the game I already made progress on. UNINSTALLED...
description: Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.FEATURES- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods- Produce supplies to manufacture goods- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sectorForge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access. Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.Imprint:	https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint
descriptionHTML:
Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.

FEATURES

- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).
- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods
- Produce supplies to manufacture goods
- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors
- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards
- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sector

Forge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access.

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint

description: Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active ‚Äì pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help ‚Äì it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.Features‚úì Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies‚úì Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go‚úì Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!‚úì Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block‚úì Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuckMore features- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakesHighlights‚Ä¢ More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles‚Ä¢ 9x9 grid‚Ä¢ 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert‚Ä¢ Support both phones and tablets‚Ä¢ Portrait and landscape mode for tablets‚Ä¢ Simple and intuitive designTrain your brain anywhere, anytime!
descriptionHTML:
Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.

Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.

Features
✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies
✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuck

More features
- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakes

Highlights
• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles
• 9x9 grid
• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert
• Support both phones and tablets
• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
• Simple and intuitive design

Train your brain anywhere, anytime!

title: Sudoku

descriptionHTML:
Blue, pink, yellow, white, oh my! Cotton Candy comes in many different colors and flavors, and now’s your chance to make your very own whenever you want. Pick your favorite color. Choose a tasty flavor. Mix and match them all! There are tons of options to try, so let’s get to cooking!

comments: Very fun game. Multiplayer is awsome! Please add private matches so i can play with friends.   Physics still need work to hold up to real world standard. Rocks dont follow thru on take outs in real life as they do in this game. Also (rules), a rock needs to make it all the way over the hogline in order to stay in play.  Thank you for making this game!

Best curling game I've seen Enjoy the graphics, controls, love the 1 on 1 against international players and career game options. Seems consistent and easy to learn. Needs a few tweaks like... throws that don't make hog line or touch hogline must be taken out of play. Have seen the bug that others reported, sometimes rock after thrown disappears , some kind of glitch that happens occasionally.  Sometimes the sweepers don't react to my movement to sweep. Would love to see 8 stones instead of 6. If you love curling, this should satisfy

Great game except for hackers. There is a hack that allows some to bump or change finish of a throw. Yoy can go from having 2 scoring to opponent having the score, changing after the rocks stopped. Developers have not replied ti report. Fine for some fun but don't waste your money in upgrades

Physics are not like real curling, rocks are dead in the house when hit, physically impossible doubles and triples, improper use of the free guard zone rules (if a rock is in the house, it is free to be removed...not in this game).  Connecting people across the globe is a cool idea but you frequently lose people and you win without finishing a game.  I've played for 35 years so I speak from experience.

Full of cheaters Started to play and it was awesome. But it seems that some people created cheats and make your pins move from their places without even theirs touching them so that they win points. I will not play it until its updated and try again. Too bad.

Not bad for free. Minimal ads. The two drawbacks are that in career mode, the game is slanted in the opponents favour too much. And in 1 on 1, it takes forever to load an opponent. Fix that and I would give it a five star rating. Also, it would be nice to see the developer actually respond to some people's concerns.

description: CLASSIC BUBBLE SHOOTING FUN!Match, pop and burst all the colorful bubbles in this addictive, enjoyable puzzle game. Play now for free and enjoy plenty of challenging puzzles and levels.  The fun never ends with Ultimate Bubbles! Experience the thrill of shooting and blasting bubbles and challenge yourself with thousands of exciting levels as you advance through the game. Join the fun and enjoy popping all the colored balls anytime and anywhere you want.   If you love online puzzle games and just can‚Äôt get enough of exciting brain teasers, Ultimate Bubbles is the perfect game for you!  Play & Discover:- Crazy bubble popping fun.   - Thousands of levels to solve, with unique features and challenges. - Awesome boosters and power-ups. - Free to play!- Addictive gameplay, cool visual effects.  Pop all Bubbles to Win!- Drag your finger to move the laser aim and lift it to burst bubbles.  	- Form a group of 3 or more bubbles of the same color to pop. - Boost your experience with awesome power-ups. - Master all the different challenges and solve fun puzzles.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                - Crush the bubbles and clear the board.                                                                                                 - Pop 7 bubbles in a row to get a fireball that will burn every bubble on the way.                         - Drop 10 bubbles in a single shot to get a bomb that will take out surrounding bubbles.                   - Take your time and plan your moves. Start the thrilling adventure today and explore plenty of exciting levels packed with awesome power-ups and challenging puzzles. Thanks for playing and enjoy the game!
descriptionHTML:
CLASSIC BUBBLE SHOOTING FUN!

Match, pop and burst all the colorful bubbles in this addictive, enjoyable puzzle game. Play now for free and enjoy plenty of challenging puzzles and levels.

The fun never ends with Ultimate Bubbles!
Experience the thrill of shooting and blasting bubbles and challenge yourself with thousands of exciting levels as you advance through the game. Join the fun and enjoy popping all the colored balls anytime and anywhere you want.

If you love online puzzle games and just can’t get enough of exciting brain teasers, Ultimate Bubbles is the perfect game for you!

Play & Discover:
- Crazy bubble popping fun.
- Thousands of levels to solve, with unique features and challenges.
- Awesome boosters and power-ups.
- Free to play!
- Addictive gameplay, cool visual effects.

Pop all Bubbles to Win!
- Drag your finger to move the laser aim and lift it to burst bubbles.
- Form a group of 3 or more bubbles of the same color to pop.
- Boost your experience with awesome power-ups.
- Master all the different challenges and solve fun puzzles. - Crush the bubbles and clear the board. - Pop 7 bubbles in a row to get a fireball that will burn every bubble on the way. - Drop 10 bubbles in a single shot to get a bomb that will take out surrounding bubbles. - Take your time and plan your moves.

Start the thrilling adventure today and explore plenty of exciting levels packed with awesome power-ups and challenging puzzles.
Thanks for playing and enjoy the game!

descriptionHTML:
Your favorite characters in a brand new adventure;
In this new world, you are our only hope!

● After 14 years, Seal Online From Korea is Back!
The classic returns!
Finally play Seal Online in multiplayer mode on your mobile – a whole new story with a brand new experience!

● 3 Classes Are Back: Knights, Priests and Jesters!
An improved world-view with more exciting levels to challenge.
Upgrade your character, choose skills, gear and train pets.
Alliance system, World Boss gameplays, Arena, Survival challenges, Magic Beanstalk, and more for you to explore!

● Hide the Cleavers! Rascal Rabbit is Back!
Train pets and take them with you – over 40 kinds, all cute yet deadly!
Ride your mount into battle; no need to tire your little legs anymore...

● Hundreds of Costumes; Dress to Impress
Wondering what to wear today? Change costumes according to your mood.
Loads of fashion and accessories to choose from. If you can imagine it, we’ve got it!

● Say Goodbye to Singledom – Let’s Get Married!
Tired of being single? Try out the in-game wedding system.
Earn intimacy points and propose to the object of your desire.
Hold a wedding banquet, choose your wedding dress and invite your friends to witness your special occasion!

Chat with players in-game using text or voice messages.
The fairest trading system around; perfect for making new friends!

Multiplayer mode.

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope‚Äì you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

description: Integrate yourself into a world of high stakes deception and heart pumping action when you download, Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break. It's time to run, shoot and dodge fellow inmates and vicious prison guards. Feel the danger as you blast through three intense landscapes and enjoy amazing 3D graphics and pixel game animations. Download for FREE today and experience a classic block game for the ages.The Underbelly of the Justice System...Due to a political conspiracy, an innocent man has been locked away behind bars at a super-max penitentiary, his termination imminent. He insists he's innocent, but there is no proof or ounce of human-compassion to support his claim. This man, is you. Meanwhile, his absence from the capitol has opened up the seat to a demonical politician whose corrupt beliefs have the capability of upturning a nation. Time is of the Essence... It's time to take drastic measures and claim your own freedom and prove your innocence before the government is overtaken by double crossing politicians and the nation as you know it is turned upside-down. Think Strategically, Fight for Survival...When the time is right, you make a break for it, knowing the inner workings of the system. Understanding this will be no easy task, but an exhausting feat of brute and intelligence, you begin the fight for your life. Cops Vs Robbers: Jail Break is a challenging first person shooter action game that is a thrill a minute experience. From the collection of hidden melee and firearm weapons and the scattering of helpful pickups to the mobs of savage enemies and the tricky landscapes, this game is ripe with intense play. Enjoy intuitive controls and massive levels that boast dangerous battles that will require quick thinking and fast reflexes. Fight your way against dozens of foes and take control over the justice system as you battle your way to freedom. The fight starts now. Characteristics: Hidden melee & firearm weapons. Collect health and ammo pickups as you explore your surroundings. Prepare for enemies to increase as levels progress. Interactive map. Choose from a variety of weapons. Expansive levels to explore.

comments: The game is okay it has a lot of faults. The matching system is horrible it always puts me against people that are hundreds of levels higher than me. And somehow their money regenerate quicker and they're able to send  out more and bigger and better units out on the battlefield. Even when the matchmaking system puts me against somebody my own level their money regenerates quicker than mine and they send out a lot more units faster than I can for whatever reason. Uninstalling this game

I absolutely love this game! As a person who enjoys strategy games, from RTS such as Stronghold, Supreme Commander, and C&C, this game takes my top 3 for the phone. The match making system is very good at keeping same skilled players together, as well as it isn't very much a pay to win game. The units are decently balanced and the game isn't to slow or fast. Definitely a game I will keep playing for a long time. I do want to ask, if you guys will be putting in a "survival mode", and withstand against waves of enemies. Great job FourThirtyThree

I'll update whenever I can actually play the game. It's up to date. I get to the screen that asks if I'd like to use my Google account or Facebook account. I do not have a Facebook. Obviously I have a Google account. I'm writing this review. I click Google and both options disappear. It sets at that screen where the two options were previously available and nothing happens. I made sure to wait around 5 mins to see if it was a loading issue.. dunno. I'd love to try out the game.

really good game i love it but just some ideas that might make it even better (I think the menu on the left side could have a higher contrast (text and background)or I think the trophy chest amount could be adjusted to the player amount in the clan +to participate in trophy chest you have to be in the clan since it started (midnight)please do some balance changes soon... some untis don't feel to be used enough or some just are OP like the steel saw mech or another idea :to have some way to delete (locked) chests )please reply if you (4:33)see it and want to give a statement

This game is awesome, it reminds me of Guns Up! . The ONLY thing I don't like about it is it's basically pay to win. It's very unique in it's actually a wonderfully crafted game and not some thrown together garbage. I probably will end up throwing money at it only because it's made so we'll. But like I said I do feel the process for opening chests is a bit too cash hungry...

comments: This game is so dumb it's cute. The spells and attacks can be difficult, but only if you aren't watching your MP bar. Overall, I'd definitely recommend the game - though some tweaks to make the combat system a little easier to grasp for new players would definitely benefit the game.

I like this game, it's a nice tap game. However, there are some issues I have noticed, it will lag. The lagging kills me on a regular basis, but that's okay, it has infuriated me to an extent. The controls are self explanatory, so this is a nice game for parents to download for their kids to enjoy as well.

Since the game cost money I didn't think it would be one of those pay to win mobile games. I was wrong :( a basic crawler and idle game where you have to either wait for gold to mine or pay for gems to progress

The game is nice but have glitches that need to be fixed when you get to the 10th floor the boos glitches and stopped moving while I was healing up. Also if didn't move Intel I used an ability. Also when using an ability like healing you get so7nd effects every time that happens it glitch not sure why but when ever you get the same sound effect from taking money or healing you get a little glitch.
Paid pay to win. You can't buy almost anything with money from the game. Childish gameplay and history (not necessarily in a bad way, but I didn't liked it)

comments: This game is mind blowing. The art style is great the animations and the crafting. However u can improve this great game. 1: It would be better if u could tell us what each material is and what can it be used for by adding an information section. Add more building materials. U can add a fence so that we can guard our house and more weapons and types of arrows (üî• fire arrows, bomb arrows) something like that and more clothing. Also add multiplayer (cuz it would be fun).Overall this is the hands down best survival game on mobile. TBH I thought this game would be a dark souls on mobile but no it's better than that.

I love the game, the crafting system is awesome, the gameplay is great. However, there are some points that I suggest  1. Nerf the Damned, also the Lepers, they are strong for beginners. Club can't beat them easily 2. Make another way to find leek seeds 3. Lepers can detect you sneaking to them, and they spawn out of nowhere. I don't know if it is a bug or not. 4. Cooking meat uses too much wood.  I look forward for more updates. It's a great game to be honest.

It's a good attempt but too easy to die. No water. Seriously? I have an empty bottle yet nothing to put in it. I would like the chance to explore and build BEFORE I die five times and can't reclaim the stuff I've spent time collecting.  If these things are remedied I'll try again. Till then, deleting.

Honestly it's a great game and lots of fun but that energy mechanic needs to change. I know you can walk but it's still such a strange thing to gate your players out of playing.  Maybe if you could always travel at the same speed but if you didn't spend energy you could be attacked randomly while you travel. Or if energy was used to speed up crafting. I dunno but it's the only thing holding me back from a perfect score.

This game is awesome but here are the things like really want in the next game. 1. I need to disconnect with Google play to delete my old saved progress full of mistakes. Please add this feature. 2. Zombies are too hard to beat . Please decrease some of their capabilities. 3. There must be an increase in chest slots . 4. Please decrease the quantity of wood logs to cook. Otherwise all of our hardworking to gather logs while be replaced by only a few meats and others. 6. Please add another source of getting seeds. They are too hard to get.

Very good idea but lack of some stuff like improvements. Right now the demolition system not work and we cannot move the walls or floors. The energy should be more sustainable and will be good if the trees on the base and some stuff randomly spawn. I will drop the game for now and on the future i Will give another shoot
description: Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!‚óè EXPLORE NEW LANDSExplore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors‚Äô castles to obtain the most valuable resources.‚óè LEARN CRAFTINGBuild workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands‚Äô most dangerous inhabitants.‚óè IMPROVE YOUR CASTLEBuild a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don‚Äôt forget to explore your enemies‚Äô territory to collect valuable loot.‚óè DEFEAT ENEMIESMorning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!‚óè SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don‚Äôt miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.‚óè OVERCOME HARDSHIPLife in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.‚óè BEFRIEND THE RAVENSBuild a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.‚óè JOIN A CLANA clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.‚óè PREPARE FOR THE NIGHTWhen night descends, darkness floods the world, and you‚Äôll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.‚óè RECEIVE REWARDSYou may feel alone, but you are not. There‚Äôs always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that‚Äôs the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.‚óè SOLVE THE MYSTERYSearch for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire‚Äôs ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.

comments: This is the best life simulator game by far. Instead of just focusing on getting rich this game has many other focuses like love, nationality, jobs, kids etc. The one thing that isn't at all necessary but I kind of want to see is a avatar for the character you're playing as. Perfect game. üòÅüëç  EDIT: hi just reporting on a glitch in the game. There's an option to transition your gender bit even though my character is over 18 they can't do it. Otherwise still a perfect game.

I think it's incredible and I am hooked. Although I do hope for more such as, instead of just instagram famous, perhaps become a famed scientist, actor, writer, astronaut or business person OR be known as beloved (or not so) Educator/Teacher etc. A bit more drama added with partner/children good and not so good. Varying reactions to their dilemmas, perhaps even a child dating, married, having a child (grandkids) and other random child updates with or without the option to react accordingly. Overall, addictive and thoughtful game.

Hi - playing this game for a few months now and a big fan. I suggested during beta phase that there should be an option of money management as well. We can be a millionaire but dont know what to do with all that liquid. We should be able to invest in moveable and immoveble assets. Should be able to open a company/business and invest in other company's stocks etc. This game will be even more interesting that way. Hope we will see these features soon. Thanks.

I have been playing through the beta phase, and am completely hooked. You can pick it up and play whenever the mood strikes. It is easy to grasp, every new life is different, and it is engrossing without being addictive. Once you're done with a life you can create a new one or close the app and move on with your real one. There is no waiting for something to build or happen, there are very few ads and most are by choice to gain something. There are no in-app purchases to enhance game play, its all there from the beginning. The developers have done an incredible job with a simple concept.

Truly amazing game. Highly recommended to anyone who likes simulator games. Works without wifi and the developers listen to what u have to say. Sure, there are a few glitches but I'm sure they'll get fixed over time. Loved it Edit: can you transition your gender without having gender dysphoria

First of all, congratulations on the full release! I've been playing this game for a few months now and I'm absolutely hooked. Whenever I'm bored or don't want to use my phone's data, I just play this game. There are a few things that I think would be cool to add in or go more in depth with, but other than that, this game is borderline perfect! I reccomend downloading
description: Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
descriptionHTML:
Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.

Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?

Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?

Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?

Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...

Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.

InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.

comments: This is an amazing game, but it has pros and some cons. PROS: This game has too many pros to list (two of the pros are that it's very realistic, and there's a sandbox). CONS: Engine noise that is different for each vehicle would be nice, but at least not every vehicle has the same sound. Sometimes certain "crews" (AKA Skins) don't apply to certain vehicles. It says you fell of the world when you fall off of the world.

Great game and the best part is it's free!! The only thing I can see that could use some improvement are the controls... and it wouldn't hurt to be able to change the point of view... other than that I say "jolly good show" as I tip my hat to the creators!

Way too many ads. Not just ads, it's that annoying video-kind of ad you have to watch X seconds before you can skip. After every single level. Even in the tutorial, where you need about 30 secs - 1 minute per level.

The ads never stop! videos you can't skip, two ads in between every level, you can't even exit the app with two more ads popping up and having to wait for them to close. Developer should've taken less money to make the gameplay better.

Fun for 3 minutes, then i saw the same ad ten times in a row. OMG. I get it, you have to make money, but this is ridiculous. The forced ads are unbearable. If i wanted to install Terminator wars, Clash of Clans or Bubble Witch Saga, i would have done it already.

Loved the start and finish. Got away from me a little with the desert levels... and the random water levels at the end of the city map. Would've loved more loading and unloading of trucks and as well as the construction arc you sometimes saw with buildings going up.

comments: I've tried about most of the bowling games on line and none compare with this one.  I almost had a perfect 300 game but for 1 spare frame.  You can back off the foul line and really speed the ball for a perfect strike.  None of the others can do that!  Love it.  One change please, put the high score function back into play. Finally got my 1st perfect 300 game and no one witnessed it!  ü§óüò†üëç

This is a nice bowling game that works beautifully on my 10" tablet.  The ball can be rolled slow or very fast.  The pins act as if they're very light weight.  This is a good game for beginners or anyone who just wants to bowl a quick, satisfying game. Aiming the ball is easy. I like the fact that this game connects to Google Play Games.  The ball can appear a darker color if pulled back toward you too far. Check out the ball with the hand imprint or the one with the spider.  If I could recommend one update, it would be to update the year (2014 bugs me) and prevent the ball from being snagged up by the thin black line.  Also, please relay my score rather than telling me to wait until a friend plays for comparison.

REAL BOWLING!!!!! Wow finally found a good no frills bowling game! The ball movement is wonderful! You can get it to do all kinds of things. I can launch it like a missile or granny roll and even throw yes throw!!!! IT HAVE FUN if I could give it ten stars I would.
Best bowling game on the app store There are so many games with all this unneeded nonsense, you have no idea how hard it is to find a bowling game where you just roll a ball at pins.
Crappy.. No arrows on the lanes and you can throw the ball 200 mph.. Kinda OK game if your not really looking for the bowling experience..
Great time killer The only reason I stoped playing is eventually it would not let me see my scores without having to share on internet. I would not.

description: Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.
descriptionHTML:
Quick and action packed dice based battles for players looking for something more than the guesswork of Battleship but not quite the complexity of Chess.

* Play turn based battles in realtime in online multiplayer mode with opponents from around the world, or play solo vs the AI.

* Singleplayer AI features three different play styles: Aggressive, Defensive & Balanced.

* Three basic unit types: Infantry, Tanks and Rocket Artillery.

* Earn reputation and gold for every enemy you destroy and for every match you win.

* Level up to unlock and deploy more options like landmine, transport helicopter, fighter aircraft and battleship.

* Plant landmines to surprise enemy infantry.

* Use helicopters to airdrop your forces behind enemy lines.

* Call in air strikes to destroy enemies on the ground.

* Deploy a battleship to launch cruise missiles deep into enemy territory.
summary: Simple turn based strategy game with a unique mix of tactics and luck.
title: Board Battlefield

comments: I would have bought the ad free Version eventually, but it was so annoying even to get used to the game, that I gave up. If you want more people to buy the game you have to give them the opportunity to play without being interrupted every death. Your game can be the best ever but still no one will play it if they have to invest the same time in watching ads that they invest in playing the game.
Game is good. Ads are bloody appalling. I have to waste 30 seconds each time I die? No thank you
Alright if you like ads more than gameplay. Stuck with 30 second ads after 20 secs of play. Don't mind some ads, but this is overkill. Pass.

Edit: Ruined it because if the ads. I understand why you have them, but I was willing to watch them IF I felt like doing another round or not. Having the choice to watch one or not was nice. Now you're just forced to after death. Sorry, that's never a good idea. And no, save your copy pasted response, I don't want it. It's not genuine, and it's just a plead for us to buy the ad removal thing.  Original: The core gameplay loop is cool. It's fun, I'll keep booting it up. But it would benefit greatly by a better tutorial. As someone else said before, the ball tends to fly off and lose momentum in ways I can't seem to figure out. Might be a failing on my part, but at times it feels like gravity changes the rules at random and I'm left floating hopelessly as the void swallows me up. I'm not really sure what the optimal way to survive is
It's a great game, for users complaining about ads, it's called ad blocker. When devs force a billion ads and make it unplayable, I use adaway, game is great after, but without adaway, don't bother!

The game itself is a lot of fun, it's challenging and addictive but with ads this game is a nightmare, they massively hinder your ability to progress and learn the game which is very frustrating. I made the in app purchase to remove the ads and without them the game is flawless. I think if the ads were reworked to be slightly less regular (i.e. not every time you lose) more people would be able to appreciate the game and might be more inclined to make the in aop purchase to remove them rather than getting annoyed at them before they've had a chance to enjoy the game.

descriptionHTML:
Flow along an infinite horizon and challenge your Facebook friends in FLO. Roll your ball up and down hills to gain speed in this exciting, fast-paced infinite runner.

Use simple one-touch tap gameplay to travel as far as you can, achieve your personal best and connect with Facebook to see friends’ playing FLO, then challenge them to beat your high score!

Dodge deadly mine obstacles with one tap to flow through the horizon. Hitting a mine will reduce the speed of the ball, making it harder to beat your friends’ scores on the leaderboard.

★ Travel above the horizon to pick up speed as you roll down
★ Travel below the horizon to pick up speed as you roll up
★ Dodge the mines and flow through the horizon by tapping on impact
★ Tap and hold to glide past obstacles
★ Smash through score walls set by your Facebook friends
★ Losing momentum brings the Wall of Death ever closer. If it engulfs you, it’s game over

FLO is a beautiful game experience with music tracks by UK Hardcore act Fracus & Darwin.


Thank you for downloading this game from everyone at Rogue Games.

Thank you!
descriptionHTML:
Balls Blast is uniquely designed to release your stress.
Your only target is to shoot the balls before they get to the bottom of the screen.
Controls are super smooth and easy, just drag left right to aim, tap for bomb and swipe up for a wipeout. That's it.
The default is one bullet but you can pick up 2 and 3 bullet powerups which will last for 5 seconds but there will be plenty of them to keep you entertained.

Try to top the leaderboard.

Have Fun and share with your friends. Thank you!
